# Speed Stars
Speed Stars is a free online running game where players can experience realistic sprinting and compete globally. The site offers instant browser-based gameplay with no downloads required.

## Core Content
- [Products](https://speedstars.xyz/): Free online running game, Speed Stars.
- [Services](https://speedstars.xyz/): Online gaming, global leaderboards, and community competition.
- [Blog](https://speedstars.xyz/blog/): Tips, updates, and news about Speed Stars and online gaming.

## Common Resources
- [FAQ](https://speedstars.xyz/#faq): Answers to frequently asked questions about Speed Stars.
- [Contact](mailto:tangjei@gmail.com): Contact us for support or inquiries.

## Optional
- [About Us](https://speedstars.xyz/#about): Learn more about the Speed Stars team.
- [Case Studies](https://speedstars.xyz/#testimonials): Success stories and player testimonials.
